en.title: Help Put "Christmas For Payatas" Videos on Front Page of YouTube!
en.content:
Dear FE Leaders, Members and Caring Members of the Public,

FE is working hard to help bring awareness to the situation faced by the 25,000 children living under atrocious conditions in Payatas, Philippines. "Christmas For Payatas" Charity Appeal, of which FE is a major donor and sponsor, will help provide much needed food, healthcare and education programs to these children.

You can help by donating generously!

You can also help by watching the videos and emailing everyone you know to watch as well. By doing so, you will HELP put the "Christmas For Payatas" videos on the FRONT PAGE of YouTube and enable it to reach out to everyone in the World!

A little effort on your part will go a long way towards helping the children of Payatas and bring some cheer to them this Christmas!
